CustomField.description:
If "Type" is "Dynamic Single Related List", provide the "cmpId" of the dynamic related list obtained from the list URL (i.e. lst_dynamicRelatedList2, if this was the second dynamic related list that was placed on a flexipage).
If "Type" is "Single Related List", provide the related list name of the single related list obtained from the list URL (i.e. TLS_Information__r).
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If "Type" is "Dynamic Single Related List", provide the "cmpId" of the dynamic related list obtained from the list URL (i.e. lst_dynamicRelatedList2, if this was the second dynamic related list that was placed on a flexipage).
If "Type" is "Single Related List", provide the related list name of the single related list obtained from the list URL (i.e. TLS_Information__r).
CustomField.label: List Name
